name: Trash Taste Podcast: The Dating Sim
name_original: Trash Taste Podcast: The Dating Sim
description:
When Chris "Abroad in Japan" Broad is confronted by three hunky boys, how will he decide which one he will spend the rest of his life with? Play through the questions asked to Mr. Broad on the Trash Taste Podcast and see if you can help him find true love.

It's a visual novel so not much to explain. The boys will ask you questions and depending on your answer certain members will gravitate towards you more than others. Once you reach the end, go back to the title and try to get a different ending.

Also this game is basically a giant shitpost and should be treated as such. It's a big joke and in no way represents the real people involved. If this offends any of them I'll take it down.
